sentences.english: Weather permitting(=If weather permits), they will go on an outing to the beach tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 如果天气允许的话，他们将在明天组织一次海滨小游。

sentences.english: Weather permitting, they will go on an outing to the beach tomorrow…
sentences.chinese: 如果天气允许的话，他们将在明天组织一次海滨小游。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
little sister/girl/(Tw) young female employee working in a low-level role dealing with the public (assistant, waitress, attendant etc)
(bird species of China) little gull (Hydrocoloeus minutus)
a person after one's heart (charming person)/capable person
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
